root: ^The sound of sirens fill my senses as I feel my stomach drop. I look around frantically but it seems I'm the only one left of our sorry band. I'm pulled up by the arm. Oh shit, shit, shit, shit!

^"Let me look at him. Bring him over here." I hear a voice, a womans voice. I look up only to be met with a pair of beady, cold eyes staring at me, evaluating me like a piece of meat being held aloft by a butcher.

two: ^ I can't look her in the eye, she can see right through me. I feel sick enough as it is.
four: ^<I>I look her dead in the eye, as if i'd let this old bat intimidate me!
^...I avert my gaze soon after, she's far too intense.
three: ^"Boy." I feel a shiver down my spine, This was the police Oh God! We were just messing around! Just kids playing games where they shouldn't.
^"I've seen your face before, you've been reported several times as a public nuisance. If i take you now it'll be for a criminal offense. That is very serious... Do you understand?"
^I nod, I feel my whole body shake, I try wriggle away but I can't, If I were standing alone I don't think my legs could move.
^"Now, I'm not in the buisness of making young boys into criminals, so how about I make you an offer?"
five: ^ I stay quiet, looking up at her with a mixture of pure anxiety and intrigue. An offer? I might not be going to jail?! Oh thank god...
six: ^<I> I scowl at the woman, trying to wriggle free once more. I can't trust her! She's just trying to trick me!
^ The policemens grip seems to tighten "Ah! That hurts, fine i'll listen!"
College: ^<I>Her "offer" it seemed was to train me as an apprentice of sorts. She made a false report saying no one was found at the scene, even destroyed any evidence of my involvement. She payed for my school fees, got me into college and had me work as her assistant in my off time.
^She was tough but fair, with mighty high expectations, but she turned my life around in ways I never expected.
^<I>It wasn't till I offically started college that I got much freedom. It's like nothing else, the teachers don't even care if you attend!
^<I>I made a new friend recently, he's a real good guy. A little scrawny and his voice breaks like a teenager but he's been my best buddy while i'm here.
^I went into class today for a change, it's actually pretty interesting this detective business. I look up from my desk and I nearly have to do a double take.
^<I>A girl i'd never seen before walks in and my brain shuts down at the mere sight of her.
^<I>She might just be the prettiest girl I've ever seen in my life!
^<I>I think she is! I look around and it seems the only available seat is right here.
^Keep it cool, it's just a girl! No need to be nervous, not with all I got going for me!
Fumble: ^"Would uhh sit here? you- uhh like to? ...Maybe?" <I>I try my best to string together something cohearent and my brain fails me.

^ My voice cracks, my face is red and my heartbeat goes a mile a minute. God what is wrong with me?! She's staring at me blankly, unsure of what to make of me as I grin like an idiot. I hope I didn't make her uncomfortable.
FumbleButWorse: ^ I can't seem to get out a single sound, not a word. I try and fail, just uncomfortably smiling at her while I feel like I'm close to a heart attack. So much for that! Idiot!
meeting: ^<I> Regardless of my best efforts, She eventually sits down. I look away awkwardly, unable to keep myself from looking at her but desperate to not be seen. Eventually I hear a noise.
^ I turn my head and I'm met with her smiling face as she giggles away at me, my idiocy. I slowly join in myself, honestly it's hard not too! God she's even prettier when she laughs...
baby: ^<I> She completely turns my life around and all the better for it! It's not long before we end up together, all thanks to my natural charms of course.
^<I> Once we graduate we go straight into the force as junior Detectives, It's tough work but we're all the better for it!
^<I> We all work together and make the world better all under our mentors guidance.
^<I> Just when I think life can't get much better, I'm blessed with something I never though I could be.
^<I> I'm gonna be a father! Me! I'm over the moon! I just know it's a girl too- the prettiest and smartest there is!
^<I> The closer we get to the day the more nervous I become, It's any day now and she'll be here.
^<I> The next thing I know the sound of sirens fill my senses as I feel my stomach drop, The paramedic following my wife into the ambulance holds me up by my arm.
^<I> "You can do it honey! just remember your breathing!" I hold her hand the entire way, I follow her as far as they let me.
